title: The Star Wars trailer, in 7 gifs
text: The Star Wars trailer, in 7 gifs October 20 2015 at 02:22pm Comment on this story You've probably watched the Star Wars: The Force Awakens trailer a dozen times already. So here's a slightly different take on the highlights of the trailer: in gif form. The long-awaited release of the Star Wars saga will open in South African on December 16 and tickets are already on sale . Want to watch the full trailer one more time?
